description.value: When the blackfrost dead is destroyed, its body shatters like brittle ice, filling the air around it with a cloud of frigid, razor-sharp ice shards. Creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] take @Damage[1d8[cold]] per level of the blackfrost dead (minimum 3d8), with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:|basic:true] save. Creatures that critically fail this save also take @Damage[1d6[bleed]].

publication.title: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires
